name: The Great Meo Task
description:
"The Great Meo Task" is a game that's supposed to be simple and fun, you will control a brave Meo that can merge into others Meos to get bigger and defeat the Orgs.

I'm still on my first steps on this game, I'm thinking of maybe making a port for mobile too when it's ready.

I would love to know your opinion about the game, please be welcome to give your suggestions!

I'm using free songs from http://www.bensound.com for now, until I produce my own songs.
